pages.text: $(item)Quantum Powerarmor$() is an upgrade to $(l:ftbic:items/carbon_armor)Carbon Powerarmor$().$(br2)With all pieces worn and charged, it has complete damage reduction from most sources.$(br2)5,000âš¡ are drained per point of damage taken; a single full charge $(major)can absorb 3,000 points of damage$().

Like Carbon Powerarmor, all pieces require the $(item)Quantum Chestplate$() to work.$(br2)The Quantum Chestplate also works as a $(l:ftbic:items/mechanical_elytra)Mechanical Elytra$(), but does not recharge with solar power.
